info.name: Darker OP.GG
info.description: A dark(er) OP.GG theme.  Started from the other dark skin and modified colors to be more monochrome.  (Special thanks to all those who worked on the other dark theme).
info.additionalInfo:
2017-06-05: Cleaned up Runes, Masteries, Leaderboard sections.
2017-03-17: Background color fixes.
2017-02-15: Updated Live Game.  Other text color changes.
2017-01-21: Updated to clean up colors on Profile page with the more detailed sections.
